mapper.select: SELECT a.rid as "ID", b.inhosno as "PatientId", c.exe_csqn as "TestOrderNo", str_to_date(a.get_sample_date, '%Y-%m-%d %T') as "ResultDate", a.item_code as "AntiCode", a.item_name as "AntiName", a.result as "TestResult", a.unit as "Unit", a.range_value as "ReferRange", a.flag as "Remark" FROM lis_result a, lis_test_reg b, lis_test_reg_his_item_detail c where a.org_code = b.org_code and a.patient_id = b.patient_id and a.machine_code = b.machine_code and a.test_form_no = b.test_form_no and a.barcode = b.barcode and b.org_code = c.org_code and b.reg_id = c.reg_id and a.patient_type = 'C' and b.test_type = '1' and a.org_code = #{orgcode} and b.inhosno = #{inhosno} and a.get_sample_date >= str_to_date(#{StartDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T') and a.get_sample_date <= str_to_date(#{EndDate}, '%Y-%m-%d %T')
